attributes.action: Provide a secure way of petitioning online
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this should mean that all petitions should be https enabled to provide security when we pass our private details (email & postal) address.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
